00019 #include "statistic.h"
00020 #include "../int_image.h"
00021 
00022 namespace ipl{
00023 
00024 CStatistic::CStatistic()
00025 {
00026         k_InitStatistic(&m_Statistic);
00027         m_StatisticsDerived=false;
00028 }
00029 
00030 
00031 CStatistic::~CStatistic()
00032 {
00033         k_EmptyStatistic(&m_Statistic);
00034 }
00035 
00036 double CStatistic::GetMean() const
00037 {
00038         if (m_StatisticsDerived==false)
00039         {
00040                 ostringstream ost;
00041                 ost << "CStatistic::GetMean() Statistics not yet derived - call DeriveStats() first" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00042                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00043                 return 0.0;
00044         }
00045         else
00046         {
00047                 return m_Statistic.Mean;
00048         }
00049 }
00050 
00051 double CStatistic::GetMin() const
00052 {
00053         if (m_StatisticsDerived==false)
00054         {
00055                 ostringstream ost;
00056                 ost << "CStatistic::GetMin() Statistics not yet derived - call DeriveStats() first" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00057                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00058                 return 0.0;
00059         }
00060         else
00061         {
00062                 return m_Statistic.Min;
00063         }
00064 }
00065 
00066 double CStatistic::GetMax() const
00067 {
00068         if (m_StatisticsDerived==false)
00069         {
00070                 ostringstream ost;
00071                 ost << "CStatistic::GetMax() Statistics not yet derived - call DeriveStats() first" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00072                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00073                 return 0.0;
00074         }
00075         else
00076         {
00077                 return m_Statistic.Max;
00078         }
00079 }
00080 
00081 double CStatistic::GetStdDev() const
00082 {
00083         if (m_StatisticsDerived==false)
00084         {
00085                 ostringstream ost;
00086                 ost << "CStatistic::GetStdDev() Statistics not yet derived - call DeriveStats() first" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00087                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00088                 return 0.0;
00089         }
00090         else
00091         {
00092                 return m_Statistic.StdDev;
00093         }
00094 }
00095 
00096 unsigned int CStatistic::GetSizeOfHistogram() const
00097 {
00098         if (m_StatisticsDerived==false)
00099         {
00100                 ostringstream ost;
00101                 ost << "CStatistic::GetSizeOfHistogram() Statistics not yet derived - call DeriveStats() first" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00102                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00103                 return 0;
00104         }
00105         else
00106         {
00107                 return m_Statistic.SizeOfHistogram;
00108         }
00109 }
00110 
00111 UINT32* CStatistic::GetHistogramPtr()
00112 {
00113         if (m_StatisticsDerived==false)
00114         {
00115                 ostringstream ost;
00116                 ost << "CStatistic::GetHistogramPtr() Statistics not yet derived - call DeriveStats() first" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00117                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00118                 return NULL;
00119         }
00120         else
00121         {
00122                 return m_Statistic.pHistogram;
00123         }
00124 }
00125 
00126 bool CStatistic::DeriveStats(const CFloatImage& Image)
00127 {
00128         bool ReturnValue=k_DeriveFloatImageStats(&m_Statistic,Image.GetConstTFloatImagePtr());
00129         if (ReturnValue==false)
00130         {
00131                 ostringstream ost;
00132                 ost << "CStatistic::DeriveStats(CFloatImage) Failed" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00133                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00134         }
00135         else
00136         {
00137                 m_StatisticsDerived=true;
00138         }
00139         return ReturnValue;     
00140 }
00141 
00142 bool CStatistic::DeriveStats(const CIntImage& Image)
00143 {
00144         bool ReturnValue=k_DeriveIntImageStats(&m_Statistic,Image.GetConstTIntImagePtr());
00145         if (ReturnValue==false)
00146         {
00147                 ostringstream ost;
00148                 ost << "CStatistic::DeriveStats(CIntImage) Failed" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00149                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00150         }
00151         else
00152         {
00153                 m_StatisticsDerived=true;
00154         }
00155         return ReturnValue;     
00156 }
00157 
00158 bool CStatistic::DeriveStats(const CStdImage& Image)
00159 {
00160         bool ReturnValue=k_DeriveImageStats(&m_Statistic,Image.GetConstTImagePtr());
00161         if (ReturnValue==false)
00162         {
00163                 ostringstream ost;
00164                 ost << "CStatistic::DeriveStats(CStdImage) Failed" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00165                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00166         }
00167         else
00168         {
00169                 m_StatisticsDerived=true;
00170         }
00171         return ReturnValue;     
00172 }
00173 
00174 bool CStatistic::DeriveStats(const CPixelGroup& PixelGroup)
00175 {
00176         bool ReturnValue=k_DerivePixelGroupStats(&m_Statistic,PixelGroup.GetConstTPixelGroupPtr());
00177         if (ReturnValue==false)
00178         {
00179                 ostringstream ost;
00180                 ost << "CStatistic::DeriveStats(CPixelGroup) Failed" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00181                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00182         }
00183         else
00184         {
00185                 m_StatisticsDerived=true;
00186         }
00187         return ReturnValue;     
00188 }
00189 
00190 ostream& operator<<(ostream& s,const CStatistic& Stat)
00191 {
00192         s << "**************** Statistic info ******************\n" << 
00193                 " Min=" << Stat.GetMin() << " Max=" << Stat.GetMax() <<
00194                 " Mean=" << Stat.GetMean() << " StdDev=" <<
00195                 Stat.GetStdDev() << "\n SizeOfHistogram=" << Stat.GetSizeOfHistogram();
00196         
00197         return s;
00198 }
